verbose_text: The breadth of ADCC mediated by the CAP228 mAbs was then assessed against the autologous transmitted / founder virus, as well as a multiclade panel of viruses (XREF_FIG and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY), using an infected cell assay where cell killing is measured as a reduction of the Luciferase signal provided by the infected cells.
evidence: ADCC mediated by the CAP228 mAbs
